column4: Smalll question, i installed Ubuntu with the boot Cd from Windows, is there a way to make my Ubuntu partition bigger, gparted is not letting me do it, and the with the Windows partition tool, the ubuntu partition does not show up ... ?
you mean you used wubi to install?
you said you used the cd to install in windows ...
so you see grub when you boot, and can choose either windows or ubuntu at startup?
